column4: Hello :) Who can help me with installing drivers for 1 wi-fi Adapter
I cant understand some things
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=49070 i was reading this
im useing ubuntu 7.04
do i need to compile my kernel?
well when i try to make
well i got too :)
but cant compile and install the driver
you don't need to recompile the kernel any longer. support is compiled into the default kernel
the instructions are way old.
Where i can find something new ?
what happens if you just enter "sudo modprobe zd1201"
that's a good sign. what does "ifconfig" say? can you paste the result in pastebin?
http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/33269/
got it
you're using eth0 at the moment, i imagine
so? any idea? or it works
so it hasn't been picked up on yet. have you tried downloading and installing the deb: http://ubuntuforums.org/attachment.php?attachmentid=23369&d=1169141035
hang on: look here: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/WifiDocs/Driver/prism2_usb
is this better than the ndiswrapper?
i dunno. the more i look at it, the more difficult it seems to become. it may be better to try it with ndiswrapper. but i've never used ndiswrapper myself
good luck :)
thanks
